Reviews.Title: Great camera - great price
Reviews.Author: Derek E Johnson
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son who would be hard on a camera.  He has used it several times and loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great, compact camera.
Reviews.Author: James Matson
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this camera. I am a home inspector and it is perfect for what I need.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA!!! ESPECIALLY UNDERWATER!!
Reviews.Author: lanaire pettway
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks. plain and simple. Used it this weekend at a pool party and took great underwater pics.  Not too bulky and got it at a great price. Definitely a best-buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: William Chappell
Reviews.Content: We use cameras in our utility work. So they have to be able to be treated a little rough. This one is great,  little rain won't hurt it. The lens doesn't expand out the front like others. This is important because when those camera get banged a little, then the lens is stuck in or out, the camera is trash. No issues with this camera. The GPS is a bonus as we can plot where we took the photo on a map.
